name: Catastrophic Crisis: Catacomb Quarantine
description:
Created in a 48 hour game jam. The theme was: "1000 Kittens"

Catch cats! Can you quarantine the crisis?

Team:  Joseph Bedsole, John Hawley, David Jones, Evan Kiser, Chris Matthews

-Cooperative game, requires 2 controllers, but controls can be rebound in the launcher.

-Press A (xbox360) to catch cats, pick up wood, and barricade cat houses.

-Keep cat count below 1000 for the alotted time.

-Get cat count to 0.

-Pick up debris to barricade the cat houses that are spawning cats.

Git Repository: https://github.com/jh318/AdventureGame/tree/master
